name: The Theater District
text1: This is where Steve Rogers wakes from his coma in Captain America(2011)
text2: He runs out of the headquarters of Morgan Stanley(standing in for S.H.I.E.L.D. headquarters).

name: Times Square
text1: Steve Rogers has been asleep for 70 years.
text2: This is his first experience of present-day New York.

name: 405 Lexington Avenue
text1: This is the Chrysler building, where Thor calls down his lightning to aide in the destruction of the Chitauri
text2: To create scenes like this, Marvel built a computer-generated city using thousands of on-location photographs.

name: Grand Central Termina
text1: This was the centerpiece of the so-called Battle of New York in The Avengers
text2: These scenes were shot in Ohio and New Mexico and the actors were placed within the digital New York

name: 200 Park Avenue
text1: This is the site of Tony Stark`s headquarters.
text2: The skyscraper was originally built as the headquarters of Pan American Airways.

name: 101 Park Avenue
text1: The black widow and Hawkeye fighters were shot down
text2: The plane glided a long way on the ground

name: Queensboro Bridge
text1: This scene from Avengers:Infinity War takes place on a speeding bus on the Queensboro.
text2: Like many of the previous sequences, the action was shot in front of a blue screen and placed within a digital environment.

name: 430 East 29th Street
text1: Overlooking this highway, the astral forms of Doctor Strange and the Ancient One discuss the nature of mortality.
text2: The Marvel movies grapple with big themes like consciousness after death.

name: Washington Square Park
text1: This is Washington Square Park, the site of a highly destructive battle in Avengers:Infinity War.
text2: This park was once a burial ground for victims of yellow fever in the 19th Century.

name: 177a Bleecker Street
text1: Go to the 177a Bleecker(Doctor Strange`s Sanctum Sanctorum).
text2: This used to be the address of Marvel Comics writers Roy Thomas and Gary Friedrich.

name: Staten Island Ferry
text1: This is where Spider-Man and Vulture has thier climactic fight in Spider-Man:Homecoming.
text2: A large-scale ferry set was built in Atlanta but some of the scene was actually flimed in New York Harbor.

name: Brooklyn Bridge
text1: This iconic steel-wire suspension bridge.
text2: helps set up Captain America`s backstory as a skinny kid from Brooklyn.

name: Verrazzano-Narrows Bridge
text1: Because of the length of the bridge, construction had to accommodate the curvature of the earth.
text2: Head to Coney Island.

name: Coney Island
text1: This was the setting for a destructive face-off between Spider-Man and Vulture.
text2: The actors were filmed on a soundstage in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Flushing Meadows Corona Park
text1: This scenes were filmed on a soundstage in Europe.
text2: The park is also featured in the 1942 New York Expo in Captain America:The First Avenger(2011)

name: Queens Boulevard&49th Street
text1: Also in Queens
text2: Spider-Man hangs around Sunnyside streets.

name: 43-25 43rd Street
text1: NULL
text2: NULL

name: 45-54 39th Place
text2: NULL

name: Bethesda Terrace
text1: Bethesda Terrace is the site of the final showdown from 2012`s The Avengers.
text2: Is also shows up in Home Alone 2:Lost in New York.

name: George Washington Bridge
text1: Hop in a cab and zip up to the GW Bridge
text2: where Stephen Srange`s journey to become Doctor Strange began.

name: Alabama Hills
text1: 这片壮观的山丘名为阿拉巴马山丘（Alabama Hills），位于美国加州的中部，在这连绵数十里的沙漠高地上布满了奇石山丘，景象非常壮观。
text2: 故事的开始发生在阿富汗的山区，这是《钢铁侠》的第一个镜头，是一切的开始，也是粉丝津津乐道的传奇画面，除了，这不是真正的阿富汗

name: Point Dume
text1: 位于加州马里布，拥有天然形成的绚丽峭壁，西北方向还能欣赏到祖马海滩 (Zuma Beach) 的美景。
text2: 电影中，这里是钢铁侠托尼的豪宅，堪称绝美，在《钢铁侠3》中，内部布设又被全新打造

name: Edwards Air Force Base
text1: 位于美国加州，创建于1930年代，曾经是美国陆军航空队及美国陆军航空军的训练中心之一。现基地内设有美国空军飞行试验中心、美国宇航局旗下的德莱顿飞行研究中心等机构，在多部电影中都有出现。
text2: 电影中这是史塔克工业航空部和私有机场，托尼从阿富汗死里逃生也在此上演。

name: Masimo Headquarters
text1: 美国著名医疗器械公司迈心诺公司总部（Masimo Headquarters），地址位于加州奥兰治县尔湾，俯瞰全景替换了迈心诺公司旁的部分建筑。
text2: 除去机场，《钢铁侠1》和《钢铁侠2》中史塔克工业基本取景于这里

name: Epic Games Headquarters
text1: 这家以《战争机器》闻名的游戏公司位于卡瑞（Cary），内部风格也是相当酷炫啊，绝对是那种你向往的办公场所。
text2: 电影中哈皮经过大厅正是此处

name: Archie K. Davis Conference Center
text1: 艾奇戴维斯会议中心位于达勒姆美国最负盛名的高科技研究和开发中心之一三角研究园（Research Triangle Park），是该中心总部所在地，也是各种会议的举办地。
text2: 派珀会见基里安的会议室正是此处

name: SAS Executive Briefing Center
text1: 位于卡瑞的SAS行政简报中心，地处SAS公司园区内，同样也是举办公司大小会议和商务会谈的场所。
text2: 总部主楼的大门，派珀送基里安离开处就是这里

name: California One
text1: 这条浪漫的公路就是著名的加州一号公路（California One），蜿蜒在太平洋西岸，全长大概有1600-1800公里，是全美风景最美的公路之一。
text2: 托尼经常驾驶着骚包的跑车往返这条公路，还曾突发奇想，中途停车给派珀买草莓

name: Sainsbury Centre for the Visual Arts
text1: 英国东安格利亚大学（UEA）的森宝利视觉艺术中心，建成于1978年。建筑为两端透明结构，约五层楼高，给人留下无干扰的自然和人造光相互作用的澄澈感。
text2: 奥创毁掉大楼之后，全新的复联总部

name: ExCel London Event Hall
text1: 展览中心是欧洲最大且最多功能的其中一个展览中心，其中心毗邻金丝雀码头和伦敦城市机场，由伦敦码头区北边的皇家船坞改建而成。它也是2012年伦敦奥运会的比赛场馆之一
text2: 复联2片尾处的一个场景取自这里

name: Roosevelt Island
text1: 这幢后期特效完成的建筑给出了一个真实的地理位置——华盛顿的罗斯福岛（Roosevelt Island），从局长办公室可以远眺林肯纪念堂和华盛顿纪念碑
text2: 神盾局总部三曲翼大楼（Triskelion SHIELD HQ）第一次露出了真面目

name: The Cleveland Museum of Art
text1: 博物馆位于俄亥俄州克里夫兰市中心，是美国最重要的美术馆和博物馆之一，1913年成立，艺术作品超过43000件
text2: 史蒂夫从电梯上一跃而下，落下的地点也是此处

name: Georgia Archives
text1: 乔治亚档案馆曾是乔治亚州官方存放档案的场所，拥有大量可追溯至几百年前的资料。档案馆成立于1918年，但直到1965年才搬入这幢14层高，被称为“白色冰立方”的大楼
text2: 电影中这家科技公司差点被反派夺走

name: Administration Building, Treasure Island
text1: 这幢建于1938年的现代主义风格政府办公大楼，还曾在《夺宝奇兵3：圣战奇兵》中被用作柏林机场。
text2: 电影中在皮姆科技公司前方是一片开阔的水域，正是此处

name: 535 West End Ave
text1: 纽约西端大道535号（535 West End Ave），是一幢完工于2011年的商住两用大楼。
text2: 史蒂芬·斯特兰奇博士的家

name: 1614 20th St NW
text1: 位于华盛顿20大街的一栋公寓
text2: 美队回到家中，遇见重伤的弗瑞，随后又和前来执行暗杀任务的冬兵交手

name: Franklin K. Lane High School
text1: 这是纽约市的一所公立高中，1923年开办，是当时世界上最大的高中之一，1937年搬至布鲁克林
text2: 做为在校生，彼得的日常就是心不在焉地上课和课后忙着救猫救狗，他就读在高中市中心科技高中
